Pocket Watch Bookmarks!!

Posted on November 8, 2014 by Emi T

Check it out!  I’m on Etsy now.  I just made a handful of bookmarks that look like cute little pocket watches.  There’s only a few designs so far, but there are more to come.  Go take a look at them in my shiny new Esty store.

Best of all, one of them sold before I could even list it!  I was taking photos outside in the light, when one of my neighbors asked what I was up to.  When I showed her my bookmarks, she bought one right then and there as a present for her mother.  Now there are only four of the initial batch left.  If you want one of these, you’d better get it quick!

Not to worry, though.  If these continue to sell well, I’ll just have to keep making more.  I’m also happy to do any sort of custom orders as well.  At the moment, my metal supplies are only of the same brass color, but I hope to branch out and try out some other antiqued metal colors as well.  Let me know in a comment if you have any suggestions.

And, of course, my very next design will be a replica of Twist’s watch from the books…  Keep an eye on this blog and my new store to see it as soon as I get it all put together!

 

Posted in Steamy Goodness, Twisty things Tagged book thong, bookmark, Clockwork Twist, CWTwist, Emily Thompson, etsy, gift ideas, gifts, pocket watch, steampunk Leave a comment
